item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 27, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:

10. The weak science behind psychedelics (23 points | 17 comments)

13. Carma (YC W24) hiring founding SWEs (remote) to build the next Uber for auto repair ( | hide)
14. Deep dive: the instability of op-amps (88 points | 32 comments)
15. Building a more robust Wikipedia interface by spotting the differences (2023) (11 points | 3 comments)

22. Live imaging of ovulation in action reveals three distinct phases in mice (84 points | 11 comments)
23. Olivetti’s Ivrea (16 points | 7 comments)
24. In the US, regenerative farming practices require unlearning past advice (275 points | 137 comments)
25. New Windows driver signature bypass allows kernel rootkit installs (257 points | 191 comments)
26. Why ghosts wear clothes or white sheets (59 points | 64 comments)
27. California is torn between clashing Anglo traditions (23 points | 34 comments)
28. "We took on Google and they were forced to pay out £2B" (39 points | 26 comments)
29. Ion engines could take us to the solar gravitational lens in less than 13 years (55 points | 51 comments)
